text: Sonja Viola Edström-Ruthström (Edström before 1960, 18 November 1930 – 15 October 2020>) was a Swedish cross-country skier. She competed at the 1952, 1956 and 1960 Olympics in the 10 km and 3 × 5 km relay events. She won bronze medals in both in 1956 and a gold medal in 1960. She was born in Luleå, Sweden. Edström died on 15 October 2020 at the age of 89.Sveriges första kvinnliga längdmedaljör på OS har gått bort ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Sweden Category:Olympic gold medalists for Sweden Category:Swedish skiers Category:People from Luleå
title: Sonja Edström
